document_data.mainbody:
Helenia was a Cashguard in the employ of the Counting House of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Helenia was a human woman with a light brown skin tone and chestnut eyes. As a Cashguard, she wore a set of uniform breastplate armor and a helmet. Yonni was armed with a two-handed heavy crossbow.
In the , Cashguard Helenia was tasked with guarding and patrolling the private docks that belonged to the Counting House in the Lower City, alongside a number of fellow Cashguards and the citys steel watchers.
